title: Interpretation of seeing shaking hands with the enemy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing shaking hands with the enemy in a dream. In dreams, many things and details that may seem unrealistic and rarely happen in life, if not impossible in some cases, come true. It is strange to see the same person shaking hands with the enemy in a dream. Although it is an unpleasant dream for some, it brings different positive interpretations of the negative impression that this dream leaves on the same dreamer after waking up. Therefore, in this article today, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a handshake with an enemy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a handshake in a dream Respected interpretation scholars have explained to us that seeing a handshake in a dream indicates kindness and that it is a praiseworthy dream. The dreamer himself from this enemy will not harm him, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a handshake with a cleric in a dream: It was said in a dream about a handshake that someone sees that he is shaking hands with the clergy or one of them. This vision indicates great goodness for the pioneer, and if he does not know it, then this indicates the goodness of the person and his security under the shadow of the Most Gracious and the closeness of his Lord Almighty. The religious person whom the dreamer shook hands with knew him, and this vision is good news for him and a sign that he will marry a beautiful and virtuous woman known for her good upbringing and morals. I have confirmed that seeing a person shaking hands with a stranger means that the fortuneteller will flee from his enemies. Interpretation of the dream of seeing shaking hands with an enemy in a dreamHere is the interpretation of seeing shaking hands with an enemy in a dream, which indicates the end of the hostility between them and its dissolution, and that it will turn from hostility to mutual love and respect between them, and if It was the dreamer who began to shake, and this indicates the other party’s desire for brotherhood between them, resolving the hostility and taking the initiative in it, and seeing the dreamer in a dream that he is shaking hands with someone with whom he works and trades shows love and mutual respect between them and them. This is amazing. They will be the best to work with each other in reality, and God is Great and All-Knowing. One of the most common interpretations regarding the dream of shaking hands with the enemy is the end of the problems going on between them, and it is also possible that the reason for seeing the dream initially was the dreamer’s intention to end the problems between him and him. Enemies to reach peace and peace of mind.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about the sea in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: I dream of seeing the sea in one dream. The interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single woman is one of the topics that a single girl raises and is always searching for what it means in the dream, but the state of this sea during the dream makes a big difference in perfection. Interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the sea for a single woman. If a girl sees herself that she is in a strong sea with high waves, and that girl is able to get out of that water, this is evidence that she will be able to escape from these evil friends associated with her. Also, getting out of this problem in the sea can It is evidence that this girl is suffering from many problems in her life, but she will be able to get rid of them and make them disappear soon. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for a single woman: When she sees a clear and calm sea in her dream, this means that she will be able to reach the highest levels of success and excellence and that she She will be able to overcome all the obstacles she faces. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for an unmarried woman: She is in the sea and the waves of this water are high and raging, and this indicates that in the coming period she will face many problems and obstacles that she faces on her way. If she sees This girl is in the previous vision, it may be a sign that some of the friends she has are not compatible with her, so they are bad friends. The same previous vision can also indicate that this wise girl will be deceived by someone close to her and it can also be evidence that this girl She will suffer from many problems in her studies or work, which will lead her to fail to complete them. Her life is on the right path. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a single woman. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for unmarried people, in its calm state, is evidence that they will have an excellent opportunity to travel to one of the other countries to start a new life that will be distinguished by it and be able to reach high positions in work, social and material life. From He sees the calm sea in his dream, showing that God will soon give her a lot of money that will significantly change her material and social life. Also, this previous vision could be an indication that this girl will enter into one of the romantic relationships that is characterized by absolute calm and stability, as it is evidence of her enjoyment With unparalleled psychological peace. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, there is an Egyptian Google website specializing in dream interpretation. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream. Whoever sees sea water in his dream, but there is a long distance between it and that water, this indicates that he will face many problems and obstacles on his path. His life. If one sees in a dream that he sees a completely calm sea without large waves, this may cause problems and obstacles and that there are many good things that the dreamer will receive. If one sees that the sea has reduced the water in it greatly, so that the bottom of the water appears This is evidence that the city in which he lives will suffer from extreme poverty and drought in the near future. title: Interpretation of a vision of wiping the face with perfume

preview.html: Interpretation of a vision of wiping the face with perfume in different situations. Perfume is a cosmetic tool used by both men and women. Each type of perfume has a different and distinctive smell, and seeing it in a dream has a different meaning. We will provide and inform you of the interpretation for every married, unmarried and pregnant woman and for all occasions according to what the eminent interpretation scholars have said. Its meaning, all you have to do is follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the dream of wiping the face with perfume: Interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing perfume in a dream is a dream worthy of praise, and indicates goodness, abundance of sustenance, and blessings from God. Ibn Sirin and other scholars showed us different interpretations that carry in Their folds are good or evil, and he explained this to us through the interpretation of the following visions: If a scholar sees in a dream that he is anointed with perfumes and fragrances, and his smell is fragrant and spicy, then this indicates his great knowledge and the diversity of his culture, and this knowledge will be the reason for his wealth and people’s knowledge of him. Likewise, if a person sees in his dream that he is wearing perfume and is suffering from financial hardship or is poor, God will enrich him from His bounty and grant him goodness. And when a person sees in a dream that he has a bottle of perfume, this vision indicates the abundance of sustenance and goodness and benefiting from God Almighty. And whoever sees In a dream, he perfumes himself and gives permission to do so, and he is one of the rich, so this indicates a great increase in livelihood, money, and legitimate profit. As for the one who dreams that he is selling perfume to people while he is deceitful, this is evidence that the dreamer breaks the promises he makes to those he loves, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. He dreams that he is putting perfume on himself, this indicates that he has a good path, a good reputation, and good faith among people. As for whoever sees himself in a dream perfumed, and a good smell comes out of him, this indicates that the dreamer has good morals, decency, and purity. And whoever sees in a dream that he is pouring If there is perfume on the ground, this indicates that he will lose someone he loves or that a good business deal will be lost from him. As for someone who breaks a bottle of perfume in a dream, this indicates disobedience to God and committing immorality. And whoever perfumes himself and his clothes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer needs to achieve a goal or Buying something, and that God Almighty will help him achieve this. The one who makes perfume in a dream shows internal stability and strong family relationships with all of his relatives, family members and friends, and this vision also shows good luck for the pioneer and the smell of the perfume heralds goodness. As for the one who sees in a dream that he is wearing A large amount of perfume, which leads to a state of fainting, then this indicates that his desires are controlling him and that God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer is sick and sees that he is good, then this indicates imminent death. But if the dreamer commits a sin and sees in a dream that he is good, This is evidence of his repentance and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream for a single woman: Seeing perfume in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a good reputation and people’s love for her. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is buying perfume, this is evidence that she is a husband and will enjoy With good manners and respect, the higher the price of the perfume

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married woman by Ibn Sirin The dream of seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman has many interpretations that Ibn Sirin explained in some of his books, and many interested people in this field have addressed it after him, and we can mention them in the following lines as follows: Seeing a married mouse in a dream, and its small size, indicates marital disputes that often arise between her and her husband. And seeing many mice at once. Some interpreted this as a large expense and a lot of money coming to her and her husband in the future. It indicates an abundance of offspring and a number of great righteous children. While seeing black mice in a dream shows the lies and hypocrisy of that lady. As for white mice, seeing them in a dream indicates the mistreatment of the married woman around her. And seeing a married woman in her dream with many cats running after mice, this indicates the collapse of marital problems and anxiety. And hunting mice in a married dream indicates her ability to harm her enemies. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a mouse in general in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a mouse in a dream with many interpretations that came With the closest points of view to the truth, including what we mention: The mouse in a dream in most cases indicates hostility and evil, and some of them herald good. The difference in the shape of the mouse in a dream is one of the reasons for the difference in the interpretation of a dream from one person to another and from one person to another. Seeing a mouse in a dream is only one and indicates a disabled woman. If a person sees many mice in his dream, this is evidence of the abundant good that he will enjoy. While seeing many mice is evidence that good comes at the same point of seeing them. Seeing many mice in a clean place indicates an abundance of blessings and goodness and an increase in food for the Lord. And mice in the house for the visionary and running away show the expulsion of evil from the house and the expulsion of haters from the house. As for wild mice, when seeing them in a dream inside the house and leaving them free, this indicates the entry of some thieves into the house. As for if the sleeper sees many mice in the house, it was full of them and their types are different. It announces the good or bad that will happen in the house in different forms. Seeing mice and their different colors in a dream and filling the house is evidence of the longevity of the owners of the house. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a white mouse in a dream Seeing a white mouse in a dream is one of the dreams that It has received many different suggestions and interpretations, and among these interpretations we mention the following: Seeing mice and their different colors in a dream and filling the house is evidence of the longevity of the owners of the house. One of the interpretations of seeing a white or gray mouse in the house indicates that the person is surrounded by a group of scammers around him. These people wish evil and hatred for the vision and he must beware of them in his life. Seeing a white mouse in a dream is a sign of major family disputes and problems at work. Seeing a white mouse can indicate a major loss in trade. Seeing the killing of a mouse in a dream indicates the dreamer's ability

title: Interpretation of breaking things in a dream: seeing something broken in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the meaning of breakage, whether it is broken car windows, cups, utensils, plates, bone wood, etc., according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a break in a dream: Seeing this symbol in a dream has multiple connotations, some of which are positive and others are negative, and this depends on the difference in the broken thing and its location on the dreamer. If one dreams that something has been broken, this means that damage and loss will occur to the extent of that thing. If a person dreams that he is breaking something in an amusement park, this indicates fixing the situation and avoiding sin. If one dreams of breaking something from an amusement park, this indicates Staying away from bad and hateful things. Whoever dreams that he is breaking religion, this indicates bad deeds. If one dreams that he is breaking a tree branch, this means harming the king’s son by actions or words. If one dreams that he is breaking a sword, this means that he is superior to a man. If one dreams that he is breaking firewood, this means that he Superior to hypocritesIf one dreams that he is breaking wood, this means that he is superior to people who speak with an amulet and break their sayings. If a person dreams that he is breaking the bone of a well-known person, this means victory in his money. If one dreams that he is breaking iron, this means great power and gaining greatness. If one dreams that he The mast breaks, it means disturbing the merchant who owns the goods. If a person dreams of breaking something made of metal, this indicates the emergence of tension. If a person dreams that he breaks gold, this indicates the collapse of anxiety. If a person dreams of breaking the substance, this indicates the corruption of faith. If a person dreams that he By breaking a spear and a bow, this indicates strength and skill. If a person dreams of breaking a saddle, this indicates a decline in greatness. If someone dreams that he is breaking a yacht, this indicates that a misfortune will happen to his family. If a person dreams that he is breaking a glass, this means that he is hurting a woman. And whoever dreams of breaking an unknown bone He spends his money. Whoever sees that his back is broken, this is the death of his master. Some passers-by said that anyone who saw his legs broken should not approach the ruler. Seeing a broken bowl affects the insight in his life. Breaking anything in a dream may indicate that you are going through a change that you desperately need to move from one stage to another that is completely different. About the previous stage. Seeing things breaking in a dream also indicates symptoms and events, perhaps tensions, perhaps noise in your family or professional environment. Seeing a broken part of the body can indicate mismanagement or failure in something and the interpretation can be according to the broken part And what it shows. As for seeing broken furniture, it can mean family disputes and emotional confusion, and the damage can be according to the value of the broken thing in the dream. Broken glass can indicate envy, and broken windows can mean the separation of a relative. As for breaking something from a kind of fun, It can be about correcting the situation, repelling sins, and regretting reprehensible actions. Everything that is good for this world and religion, breaking it is hateful, and vice versa. Whoever breaks a stone in a dream breaks the heart of a cruel man, and whoever sees that he cuts a sword in a dream is superior to the man.

title: Interpretation of seeing cold in a dream, snowfall and rain in a dream

preview.html: Does the interpretation of seeing hail in a dream have a good or bad meaning? Cold is one of the dreams that a person sees during his sleep, so he sometimes feels worried about some negative feelings, and perhaps the person wakes up feeling cold, which causes him anxiety and emotions, so many people desire this. Find out the interpretation of the cold feeling that they see in their dreams, and the desire to find an interpretation that will give them some peace. Falling in the cold in a dream for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing cold in a dream. The appearance of a dream may be disturbing for a married woman who sees cold falling on her, because it is difficult and somewhat painful, but In fact, the interpretations are opposite, such as: If a married woman sees hail falling on her from the sky, this indicates that she will obtain what she desires, and it will be beneficial and good for her. But the good news is if she sees that she is eating from the hail that has fallen, this is evidence of an increase in her diet. But If she sees that she is giving her children cold pills as food, this means that she is taking good care of them. And if a woman sees that some rain, hail, or snow is falling on her house, this indicates the spaciousness of life and relief from distress. Seeing someone shivering from the cold in a dream: Commentators differed regarding The interpretation of this dream depends on its many circumstances, but they explained several cases, including: If one sees that he is shivering from the cold in an atmosphere that was really warm, then this dream is not good and may indicate exposure to sadness and grief. But if one sees himself in a dream feeling cold, and the weather is In reality, it is a rainy winter, this indicates a good change in his life that he is happy with. If in the dream there is a small child shivering from the cold, this indicates the presence of a shy person in the dreamer’s life who cannot approach him because he is afraid of him. If the dreamer helps someone who has a cold and makes him warm This indicates his love for goodness and helping others. Seeing cold and snow in a single woman’s dreamThis type of vision often indicates good events and circumstances in one dream, such as: If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating pieces of ice, she will get a lot of sustenance, but she She will spend it in the wrong place and for no purpose. And if she sees that she is playing with the snow and forming balls as if they were bright white, this indicates that she will enjoy peace, tranquility and comfort in her life. But if she sees that snow is falling on her during its season, this is evidence of the collapse of worries, and that she will triumph over... Whoever has enmity or envy. And if she sees in her dream snow falling and raindrops falling with her, this is evidence of her close relationship with her. Interpretation of a dream about cold in summer for single women. title: Interpretation of seeing your beloved’s family in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the beloved's family in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Imam Al-Sadiq, or Ibn Shaheen via the Vision website roy2a.com. She thinks about seeing them in her dream, either his mother, sister, brother, or other loved ones, and she may be confused about the meaning and importance of seeing them in her dream. We will discuss the interpretation of seeing the beloved's family in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees the beloved's family in a dream: Seeing the beloved's family in a dream indicates a good psychological state, happiness and calm in the dreamer's life. Seeing the beloved's family in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon hear news that will make her happy. Seeing the beloved's family in a dream shows that the owner of the vision is a social person, easy to deal with and treat with courtesy and respect. See also: Interpretation of seeing the jealousy of a man or lover in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the beloved's family in a dream for a single woman: Seeing the family of her unmarried lover in a dream expresses her feeling of comfort and security towards the person she loves. Seeing the family of her unmarried lover in a dream It indicates the good relations between her and those around her, which are characterized by love, friendliness and appreciation. Seeing the family of her unmarried lover in a dream announces the world's love for her and the good reputation she enjoys among them. Seeing the family of her unmarried lover in a dream It indicates the entry of a person close to her and her engagement to him, and her relationship with his family will be distinguished. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a lover cheating in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the mother of the lover in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing the mother of the lover in a dream may be a translation of what is in her subconscious mind due to her preoccupation with this lover and her desire to communicate with him. Seeing the mother of the lover in a dream It indicates the following good for the visionary and the joy that will be announced in the near future. Seeing the mother of the lover in a dream It indicates the good news that the dreamer will hear in the coming period. Seeing the mother of the lover in a dream indicates a happy event that will soon come to the dreamer, such as the occasion of engagement or marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing the lover in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream of entering the house of the lover's family for an unmarried woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she is in the house of her lover's family expresses her great confidence in this person and her feeling of safety and security towards him. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she is in the house of her lover's family indicates her approach to marriage, leaving her family's house and moving to her husband's house. What is the interpretation of a dream about my lover's mother in our house: Seeing an unmarried woman that her lover's mother is in her house and the dreamer's satisfaction indicates love, friendship and the good relationship that will bring them together in The future. Seeing an unmarried woman being kissed by her lover’s mother in a dream indicates the good that the dreamer will obtain through this woman. Seeing a single woman being disapproved of by her lover’s mother in a dream indicates that the lover’s mother does not accept this relationship and rejects this connection. See also: Interpretation of seeing myself in the mirrors in

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment in oysters in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing an apartment in an oyster in a dream. Anxiety and psychological discomfort for the viewer, and we will explain to you, dear followers, the dream of an apartment in an alcove in a dream with pot, pregnant women, married women, and men through the interpretation books of scholars and visions. What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment in an oyster in a dream? An apartment in an alcove for a man indicates food, psychological comfort, and the death of worries and sadness. Likewise, If a girl sees a pot in her dream, an apartment full of flowers, this may indicate an expected marriage. In fact, seeing the entire apartment in a dream is evidence that his apartment in reality will be stolen by a loved one. In general, seeing the newlyweds’ entire apartment in a dream indicates Good health and a good life. What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment in a conch in a dream, complete for a common woman? Seeing the new apartment being prepared for an old girl indicates the nearness of marriage, God willing. But if a girl sees in her dream that she is fighting over an apartment, this indicates love. Also, seeing the apartment An entire apartment in a dream for a girl indicates the collapse of problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. Seeing an old apartment in a girl’s life may mean that she will marry a poor man. What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment in a niche in a dream for a married woman? Seeing an apartment in a niche for a married woman indicates that her husband He cheats on her and also indicates betrayal. However, if a married woman sees the bride’s apartment being prepared, this indicates the marriage of a relative of hers or her sister. Seeing her new apartment means her husband’s arrival means kindness, happiness, livelihood, and a better condition. What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment in an oyster in a dream for a man? Seeing an apartment In an oyster in a dream filled with a man indicates failure in achieving goals and dreams. Alternatively, seeing a furnished apartment in the dreamer’s dream means wide-ranging livelihood and participation in new jobs. Also, seeing a completed apartment in a dream generally indicates joy, pleasure, and waiting for marriage, Which will happen soon, God willing. Also, to see a married man buying an apartment in a clam in a dream, the camel indicates that he will marry again. What is the interpretation of seeing an apartment flooded with water? The interpretation of seeing an apartment flooded in a dream for a pot woman shows her many fears, sorrows and problems That surrounds it. In fact, to see that half of the apartment has been flooded in a dream means that you will be saved from death in reality and indicates that the problems will stop. Also, seeing a young man deliberately flooding the apartment with water in a dream indicates the death of someone close to him. If the water in The apartment is black, this indicates that the dreamer is married to a disabled girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a spacious apartment in a dream? The spacious apartment in the dreamer indicates that God will extend his livelihood from where he does not expect it. Seeing the spacious apartment in the dreamer’s life indicates that if he is sick, He will recover from any follow-up. If the dreamer is a merchant, God will expand his trade, and if he is an employee, he will be promoted. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggplant according to Al-Osaimi: Eggplant is a vegetable that has many benefits that support human mental and physical health. Some interpreters of the meanings of the future may be from its connotations, so we learn about the interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a dream from Al-Osaimi. A dream about eggplant in a dream about Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a dream, if it is white, means a lot of goodness and vitality. White eggplant in a dream also portends good deeds and religious duties. And obedience. The dream of black eggplant symbolizes tension, sadness, problems, and a lot of nourishment, but after hardship and exhaustion. Seeing the cultivation of black eggplant indicates good luck, optimism for the future, and a beautiful life. Interpretation of the dream of eggplant in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of eggplant in the dream of an unmarried girl is evidence of marriage. A dream about roasted eggplant could be a sign of failure in life or it could mean a breakup and annulment of an engagement. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a dream for a married woman: A dream about eating white eggplant in a dream for a married woman portends a happy time for her soon and the fulfillment of her desires. Eating cooked eggplant in a dream indicates good news And the return of the newcomer. Eating roasted eggplant indicates marital differences. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman dreams of eggplant, which means easy childbirth and a healthy fetus. Eating fried eggplant indicates the birth of a healthy child. However, if you find yourself eating roasted eggplant during the dream, this means That you will face and suffer unexpected events during the birth process. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a man’s dream. If one sees in his dream that he bought eggplant, this indicates good luck and abundance of money. Buying fresh eggplant indicates prosperity in many lives, livelihoods, and a bright future. Fried eggplant It indicates enjoying a prestigious job, the social status of the pioneer, his reputation among people and his good behavior. Eating fried eggplant also indicates good luck and good news. A dream in which you see eggplant at a different time indicates marital problems. Eating white eggplant in a dream means happiness and joy. Interpretation Buying eggplant in a dream Al-OsaimiSeeing a dream that you are buying eggplant symbolizes the arrival of good news, prosperity, wealth, and good news. Buying eggplant in a dream also indicates profit from halal sources and abundance of money. Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream. If a married woman sees herself buying eggplant, this indicates that she will be blessed. With good offspring. Seeing black eggplant in a dream means happiness and stability in marital or family life. Seeing an eggplant market in a dream indicates the next path of the journey. It also means a lot of goodness for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about a large black eggplant for a single woman in a dream. Seeing a large black eggplant in a dream indicates An unmarried woman indicates problems and fears. If she has no appetite, it indicates distress and anxiety, and if she has no appetite, it indicates distress and anxiety

title: Interpretation of a dream about a skeleton. Seeing a skeleton skull in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a skeleton for an unmarried girl, or married, or pregnant, or divorced, or married and unmarried, or for an animal for a man, with seeing the bones of the dead and the skull, the bone that comes out of the body and skulls and more on the hand of Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about a skeleton by Ibn Sirin The skeleton To see a skeleton in a dream indicates illness, misunderstanding and harm due to others, especially enemies If you dream that you are a skeleton, this portends that you will suffer from useless anxiety and you have to show your character. If you dream that a skeleton is chasing you, you will soon have an accident or die or face a financial disaster. Seeing a temple means safety from fear and victory over enemies If you see a skeleton in your dream, it represents something that has not been fully developed. Perhaps you are still in the planning stages of a situation or project and this is something that concerns you, so you dreamed of a skeleton. Otherwise, the skeleton symbolizes death, transformation, or changes. Perhaps you need to get to the bottom of the matter and be content with dealing with it on the surface. If you see a person in the form of a skeleton, this means that your relationship with him has died a long time ago. It indicates children, spouses, interests, and interest in this world and religion. The temples of Christians that were established in their churches for worship appear in a dream. Who prays there and recites the psalms, commandments, and gospels, and perhaps seeing them shows prayer and sacrifices. The skeleton in a dream is not a good symbol, and most of the dreams in which it appears are nightmares that are better forgotten than searching for an interpretation. Some common dreams in which the skeleton appears may indicate health crises that the dreamer may suffer from, whether physical or psychological. The skeleton in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s alienation from his environment or the emergence of differences between the people around him. Seeing a skeleton chasing you in your dream is a bad omen and may indicate bad luck and failure that will haunt your projects, whether material or moral. It may indicate Dancing with a skeleton in a dream indicates confusion in the dreamer's life. Hugging a skeleton in a dream may indicate an insult. Turning into a skeleton in a dream may mean that you cannot achieve what the dreamer desires, whether it is a material or moral gain. The skeleton in a dream can be a warning to the dreamer about the need to reconsider some issues related to the way of managing relationships, business and projects and may require you to delve into the problem without limiting yourself to a superficial treatment. Seeing another person turning into a skeleton in a dream may indicate a break in the relationship with him, and it may also indicate the discovery of what is hidden from one's life. Seeing skeletons and wreaths in a dream means safety from fear and victory over enemies, it indicates children, spouses, interest and interest in this world and religion. The temples of Christians that were erected in their churches for worship there appear in a dream who prays there and the psalms, commandments and gospels that are read, and perhaps seeing them shows prayer and sacrifices. Seeing a skull
